item.description:
Reading.... "listen"
Trusting Your Inner Voice in Times of Crisis" by Lynn Robinson

This is a great book on enhancing your intuition and increasing your spirituality!
You may join in on the book club at any time. It doesn't matter if you missed any meetings.

Meet for dinner at 5:00 pm (or any time you can get there) - in the cafe

6:00 pm - 7:30 pm Reading and Insights - in the event room back of store

Spiritual Book Club for Enhancing our Lives

The purpose of this book club is to read from life-changing books that help to gain insight on ourselves, our relationships and spirituality. These books that have been chosen are designed to give you a new perspective and live a happier more fulfilling life.

Unlike other book clubs, we read the book together, one or more chapters at a time (no need to read ahead of time unless you miss a meeting).  We then share our insights and perspectives on what was read.

You can buy the books on your own or get them out of the library. You can usually find used books in good condition on Amazon, Ebay, Valorebooks.com, etc. You may also order a new one from Tatnuck. I usually have a few for sale at the first meeting at a great price.

We will read one book at a time which could take several weeks or months. Once that book is completed, we will move on to the next one from the list below:

  1. A Return to Love - by Marianne Williamson completed
  2. Your Best Life Now - by Joel Osteen - completed
  3. Listen - by Lynn Robinson - enhance your intuition - started June 4

We start up again with Wishes Fulfilled on Tuesday, September 11.  See separate listing on calendar.
item.how_to_find_us: See description for meeting location and times.
item.name: Book Club - Enhance Your Intuition
